page.description: Computes a person's age. If AsOfDate is not supplied, then age as of today is computed. If AsOfDate is supplied, then age on the AsOfDate is computed.
page.prototype: Number_Of_Years as N = age(D dob [,D AsOfDate ])

argument.name: AsOfDate
argument.description: Optional. Default = DATE(). The second date to use in calculating the age.

page.discussion: AGE() returns the integer number of years between Starting_Date and Ending_Date (default now).
